thread.title: Chris Martin spotted kissing actress Annabelle Wallis
thread.title_full: Chris Martin spotted kissing actress Annabelle Wallis - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Chris Martin spotted kissing actress Annabelle Wallis
text:
1 of 6 | License Photo PARIS, Oct. 19 (UPI) -- Chris Martin cozied up to English actress Annabelle Wallis over the weekend.
The 38-year-old Coldplay singer was spotted with the 31-year-old Peaky Blinders star Saturday in Paris. Martin and Wallis weren't shy with their affections as they kissed, held hands and danced in the streets of the French capital.
Martin and Wallis were first linked in August following the singer's split from American actress Jennifer Lawrence . He and the 25-year-old Hunger Games star had reunited in the spring after breaking up for the first time in fall 2014.
"He's a nice guy, just having fun," a source told People magazine of Martin's romance with Wallis. "What woman wouldn't like that?"
The Coldplay frontman shares 11-year-old daughter Apple and 9-year-old son Moses with Gwyneth Paltrow , who filed for divorce in April after a year-long separation. The 43-year-old American actress discussed co-parenting at the #BlogHer15 conference in July.
Martin and Coldplay last released Ghost Stories in May 2014, and are expected to debut A Head Full of Dreams this year. Wallis is known for playing Jane Seymour on The Tudors and Grace Burgess on Peaky Blinders , and had a small cameo in Lawrence's film X-Men: First Class .
